description: A collection of published pieces and presentations

content.title: Virtually Alone
content.quote: Written on April 23, 2020, after I spent more than half an hour alone on a Zoom call, this poem captures the feeling of empty virtual space.

content.title: Making Editors Happy
content.quote: A short presentation on helper fuctions and Slack apps at The Texas Tribune.

content.title: Manga in the Museum
content.quote: In 2015, over 100,000 visitors attended two small manga exhibits at the British Museum, prompting the museum to open a six-zone exhibit on manga, its history, and forms on May 23, 2019.

content.title: The timeless thrill of thrifting
content.quote: It requires patience, an eye for value and the ability to sift through the piles of miscellaneous donations that fill the racks and shelves.

content.title: Stereographic Point Clouds
content.quote: A tutorial on turning a stereographic pair of images into a three dimensional point cloud.

content.title: All That Jazz
content.quote: An inquiry about Northwestern's fabulous but small and little known jazz program.
